LanguageData.VF_DisembarkNoExit: Unable to exit vehicle. No valid cells to exit onto.
LanguageData.VF_DraftVehicleDesc: Drafts vehicle allowing it to move. This will consume fuel if applicable even if the vehicle is idle.
LanguageData.VF_UndraftVehicleDesc: Undrafts vehicle, disabling the consumption of fuel and disallowing movement.
LanguageData.VF_ResetColorPalettesConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all saved palettes back to default settings? This action cannot be undone.
LanguageData.VF_SwapColors: Cycle colors between each other.\nColorOne -> ColorTwo -> ColorThree
LanguageData.VF_StartFishingDesc: Gather fish. Depth of water affects fishing chances.
LanguageData.VF_PatternZoomTooltip: Scale the pattern up or down.
LanguageData.VF_RoutePlannerButtonTip: Click to enter the planning mode for Vehicles where you can select specific vehicles you own, and plan your journey. Pathing is adjusted based on the vehicles selected.
LanguageData.VF_NoFlightSpeed: Unable to launch with Flight Speed = 0
LanguageData.VF_CannotLaunchImmobile: {0} cannot launch without being able to move.
LanguageData.VF_MustSelectColorPalette: Must have a palette selected to save over.
LanguageData.VF_HandlerNotEnoughRoom: Failed to add {0} to {1}. No more space available.
LanguageData.VF_NotEnoughToOperate: Needs more crew in order to operate.
LanguageData.VF_OutOfFuel: Cannot draft. Vehicle needs more fuel.
LanguageData.VF_UpgradeInProgress: Cannot draft while Vehicle is upgrading.
LanguageData.VF_NotEnoughCrew: Not enough colonists in {0} to operate {1}.
LanguageData.VF_IncapableStatusForRole: {0} is incapable of fulfilling this role.
LanguageData.VF_OutOfFood: No food in {0} with Pawns onboard.
LanguageData.VF_VehicleCaravanMentalBreakMovementRole: {0} is no longer able to operate their role for the vehicle caravan.
LanguageData.VF_PawnBoardedFormingCaravan: {0} has boarded the {1} and is ready for departure.
LanguageData.VF_CantMoveDocked: Not enough pawns to set sail.
LanguageData.VF_PackingSpotNotFound: Packing Spot was not found for Vehicle caravan. It is recommended you place a Packing Spot from Misc.
LanguageData.VF_ForceLeaveCaravanDesc: Force Vehicle Caravan to leave the map. Will skip loading whatever items are not currently onboard
LanguageData.VF_CaravanTerminatedNoVehicles: Caravan process has been terminated. No vehicles remain.
LanguageData.VF_LandAndSeaRoutePlannerRestriction: Cannot plan route for both Sea and Land vehicles. Paths will not register.
LanguageData.VF_LeaveVehicleBehindCaravan: Are you sure you want to leave Vehicles behind? Vehicles left behind: {0}
LanguageData.VF_MustAssignEnoughToVehicle: Must assign enough colonists to man vehicle.
LanguageData.VF_AerialVehicleLaunchNotValid: Unable to launch, conditions are not suitable.
LanguageData.VF_FlightPathMaxNodes: Maximum nodes for {0}'s flight path has been reached.
LanguageData.VF_MustTargetLanding: A landing destination must be chosen.
LanguageData.VF_ReinforcementsArrived: {0} has arrived with reinforcements to investigate the crash site.
LanguageData.VF_BoatSunkDesc: {0} has sunk to the depths of the ocean.
LanguageData.VF_CommandDockShipDesc: Unload all passengers and enable trade with the Settlement of {0}.
LanguageData.VF_CommandDockShipObjectDesc: Dock Boats and go on foot
LanguageData.VF_CommandUndockShipDesc: Load all pawns and items into Boats
LanguageData.VF_CommandAttackDockDisable: Cannot attack {0} while docked at their Settlement
LanguageData.VF_CommandTradeDockDisable: Cannot trade with {0}. Must dock boat first
LanguageData.VF_CaravanMustHaveEnoughSpaceOnShip: Not enough space on ships to house all pawns.
LanguageData.VF_CaravanMustHaveEnoughPawnsToOperate: Not enough Pawns selected to set sail. Need {0}
LanguageData.VF_CaravanMustHaveAtLeastOneVehicle: Must have at least 1 vehicle selected in order to choose a route.
LanguageData.VF_CommandReformVehicleCaravanDesc: Reform vehicle caravan with vehicles selected.
LanguageData.VF_AutoTargetingDisabled: AutoTargeting is not allowed for this turret.
LanguageData.VF_SettingsDisabledTooltip: Settings have been locked for this vehicle and cannot be modified.
LanguageData.VF_BeachGenMultiplierTooltip: Increase the amount of water on the coastline.
LanguageData.VF_ForceSettlementCoastTooltip: Push nearby faction settlements to the coast if within given radius
LanguageData.VF_WillRequireRestart: This action requires a restart to take effect.
LanguageData.VF_ModifiableSettingsTooltip:
Toggle Modifiable Settings. Restarting with this disabled will bypass generation of modifiable settings.
Determines whether Vehicles should use values from the mod settings or Defs
LanguageData.VF_CustomShadersTooltip: Enable use of custom shaders provided by the framework.
LanguageData.VF_DiagonalVehicleRenderingTooltip: Vehicles that support diagonal rendering will do so when set to diagonal rotations (NorthEast, SouthEast, SouthWest, NorthWest)
LanguageData.VF_FullVehiclePathingTooltip: Use the entire hitbox of the vehicle when determining shortest path. Vehicle will still be constrained by its size.
LanguageData.VF_SmoothVehiclePathingTooltip: Vehicle pathing will have an additional "turn" cost, preventing unnecessary zig zag patterns from shortest path.
LanguageData.VF_HierarchalPathfindingTooltip: Use HPA* instead of A* for faster pathfinding. Sacrifices a small amount of pathfinding accuracy for substantially faster pathfinding across large distances.
LanguageData.VF_RoadBiomeCostPathingTooltip: Vehicle Caravans moving over roads on the world map are still affected by biome path costs.
LanguageData.VF_MultiplePawnsPerJobTooltip: Allows vehicle related jobs to allow more than 1 pawn to reserve and work on it. Max allowed pawns determined by modders.
LanguageData.VF_HideDisabledVehiclesTooltip: Disabled vehicles from the mod settings will be hidden in architect menu.
LanguageData.VF_PassiveWaterWavesTooltip: Generate passive waves when boat is idle.
LanguageData.VF_AerialVehicleEffectsTooltip: When aerial vehicles takeoff and land, spawn flecks and render overlay textures.
LanguageData.VF_TurretOverheatMechanicsTooltip: Some turrets have overheat mechanics to prevent nonstop firing without consequences. Keep this enabled?
LanguageData.VF_FishingMultiplierTooltip: Adjust the amount of fish gathered from fishing boat.
LanguageData.VF_FishingDelayTooltip: Base amount of ticks it takes to gather fish on a fishing boat.
LanguageData.VF_FishingSkillTooltip: How much exp is given by fishing on a boat
LanguageData.VF_FishingPersistsTooltip: The Fishing Boat fishing selection will not reset upon drafting.
LanguageData.VF_RocketsBurnRadiusTooltip: Allow aerial vehicles which support this feature to burn all things within a small radius upon takeoff and landing.
LanguageData.VF_DynamicDrawingTooltip: Render aerial vehicles on the world map when zoomed in.
LanguageData.VF_DeployOnLandingTooltip: When an aerial vehicle lands all pawns onboard will be unloaded.
LanguageData.VF_DelayOnLandingTooltip: When an aerial vehicle lands the deployment of all pawns will be delayed.
LanguageData.VF_AirDefensesActiveTooltip: Certain world objects are able to utilize air defenses to shoot down nearby aircraft.
LanguageData.VF_DrawUpgradeInformationScreenTooltip: Draw additional menu on the upgrade menu to display ship stats and ship icon.
LanguageData.VF_OverrideDrawColorTooltip: When any upgrade is applied that comes with a pattern or draw color, the previous paint job will be overridden.
LanguageData.VF_EnableButtonTooltip: If disabled this vehicle will not be available in-game. Applies to both the player and NPC factions.
LanguageData.VF_NavigationTypeTooltip: Navigation category for the World Map. Dictates when the Vehicle may move on the World Map.
LanguageData.VF_NameableTooltip: Allow naming of this vehicle. Name will appear over the vehicle and will replace the displayed label.
LanguageData.VF_CombatPowerTooltip: Combat points vehicle costs in order to generate in an event.
LanguageData.VF_CanCaravanTooltip: Vehicle is able to be taken on caravans.
LanguageData.VF_DisabledSingleModDependencyTooltip: Disabled. Compatible mod not in active mod list: {0}
LanguageData.VF_DisabledMultipleModsDependencyTooltip: Disabled. Compatible mods not in active mod list: {0}
LanguageData.VF_SaveableFieldLockedTooltip: Setting is locked for this Vehicle.
LanguageData.VF_DebugDisabledTooltip: Disabled for all Vehicles at this time.
LanguageData.VF_OpportunisticTickingTooltip: Vehicle components only tick when necessary, reducing impact on performance when idle.
LanguageData.VF_ManhunterTargetsVehicleTooltip: Manhunter animals will target this vehicle.
LanguageData.VF_FishingEnabledTooltip: Enables fishing when stationary over water.
LanguageData.VF_WinterSpeedMultiplierTooltip: Additional cost for traveling during winter.
LanguageData.VF_WorldSpeedMultiplierTooltip: Multiplier to MoveSpeed when on the world map in a caravan.
LanguageData.VF_FuelConsumptionWorldTooltip: Fuel consumption multiplier on the world map.
LanguageData.VF_LaunchFixedMaxDistanceTooltip: Set a fixed max distance this vehicle can fly regardless of fuel level.
LanguageData.VF_ReconDistanceTooltip: Distance in tiles the shuttle will be able to perform recon of a site or settlement.
LanguageData.VF_ControlInFlightTooltip: Control the aerial vehicle while it is in flight. Allows for changing of flight paths midflight, choosing your landing after loading a map, and strafing maps that have not yet been loaded.
LanguageData.VF_SpaceFlightTooltip: Vehicle is capable of launching to and taking off from space objects.
LanguageData.VF_RateOfClimbTooltip: Amount the vehicle ascends per tick.
LanguageData.VF_MaxAltitudeTooltip: Maximum altitude this vehicle can achieve when in flight.
LanguageData.VF_MaxFallRateTooltip: Max amount this vehicle will descend when shot down or out of fuel.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_ResetAllConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to original values? If you were locked out of the Mod Settings from an exception, you will need to restart after the reset.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugLoggingTooltip: Enable message logging to output specific values and pieces of information useful for debugging Vehicles. Use only if you're making a Vehicle add-on.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugPathCostRecalculationLog: Log summary of path cost change for all vehicles affected by region dirtying.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDraftAnyVehicleTooltip: Be able to draft and move any vehicle regardless of passengers. Useful for empty boats in deep water or if you want to expedite testing.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugShootAnyTurretTooltip: Be able to shoot any turret regardless if the turret is being operated.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugSpawnVehiclesGodModeTool: Vehicle blueprints being placed in godmode will spawn the Building variant as opposed to generating a VehiclePawn for spawning.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawUpgradeNodeGridToolt: Draw UpgradeTree grid for placement on (x,y) axis.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawHitboxTooltip: Draw vehicle's hitbox by highlighting the map cells the vehicle occupies.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawVehicleTracksTooltip: Draw cells occupied by vehicle's "VehicleTracks" which mark what cells will end up being damaged per move action.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawBumpersTooltip: Draw cells immediately in front of vehicle that will indicate when the vehicle "bumps" into something and halts pathing.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawLordMeetingPointTool: Highlights the cell where the Form Vehicle Caravan meeting point has been set.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugPathfinderDebuggingToolt: Open menu for debugging various outputs of pathfinding (both cell based and region based)
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugWorldPathfinderDebugging: Open menu for debugging WorldPathGrid for any VehicleDef.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawVehiclePathingCostsT: Draw costs per cell/tile calculated from pathfinder. Shows accumulated path cost.
LanguageData.VF_DevMode_DebugDrawPathfinderSearchTool: Draws Pathfinder search as it opens and closes nodes searching for a path. Will also show chunk search if Hierarchal Pathfinding is enabled. Pathfinder is intentionally slowed down in order to clearly show the process, as the async search is too fast in most cases to view.
